title: Still In Love
lyrics:
Summer night, drinkin' wine
By the fire, catchin' up
You looking good, wish I could
Tell you I was over us
I get high every night when I’m all alone

'Cause it helps me forget that I’m feeling low

Told you I was doing fine

But it's a lie, don't you know

And if you want the truth



I’m still in love with you

No matter what I do

I’m still in love with you



Tell myself I don’t care

Who you’re with, I’m losin' my mind

I picture you making love to someone else

Tell me why



I get drunk to shut up all these memories

And I wake up and they come running back to me

So have your fun givin' up

I guess you won and I messed up

And I'm acting a fool



'Cause I’m still in love with you

No matter what I do

I’m still in love with you

Tell me you want me, too

(You want me too)

'Cause I’m still in love with you



And it’s killing me

Endlessly, oh

And I’m bound to be

Somebody who's helplessly and desperately

Still in love



I’m still in love with you

(I am still in love)

I’m still in love with you

(With you, only tell me that you love me too)

Tell me you want me too

I’m still in love with you
